name: cloud 4eq
author: saeed mohammadi

sections.description:
when you install this plugin in your post editor you can see 4eq cloud in your DASHBOARD: you can select start uploading photos to Cloud 4eq and set to your post for that Your image has been uploaded to the img.4eq.ir site and the link of your image that uploaded to our host was inserted to your post
or click return ;
http://4eq.ir/page/terms is link to the services’ a terms of use and/or privacy policies
Check out our dynamic knowledge base for additional questions and articles.

this is your one stop shop for EVERY image related task.

all your images are automatically uploaded, compressed up to 0.01 of first valume fo example from 100mb reduce to 1mb, normalized, optimized and backed-up

in the cloud instead of being hosted on your servers.
you can stop messing around with image editors. this plugin can manipulate and transform your images online, on-the-fly, directly from your WordPress

console. Enhance your images using every possible filter and effect you can think of. All manipulations are done in the cloud using super-powerful hardware,

and all resulting images are cached, optimized (smushed and more) and delivered via a lightning fast content delivery network (CDN).

Install plugin now, get the most powerful image solution available today, and get your WordPress powered site to the next level.

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I find answers to additional common questions?

Check out our dynamic knowledge base for additional questions and articles.

short_description: speed up your site by Upload images to the cloud, deliver optimized via a fast CDN. Perform smart resizing and apply effects.
